HowTo.rtf: {\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang4105{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset178 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red128\green255\blue0;\red128\green100\blue162;\red255\green128\blue64;\red75\green172\blue198;\red155\green187\blue89;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green192\blue0;\red0\green255\blue255;\red221\green132\blue132;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\sl240\slmult1\lang9\f0\fs22 Evolve from a 3rd Evolution mag at level 100 when meeting one of the following requirements.\par \par \b Female\b0 \b FO\b0 rce\par \cf1\b Greenill\cf0 , \cf2 Purplenum\cf0 , \cf3 Oran\cf0\par \cf4 DEF \cf0 + \cf5 MIND \cf0 = \cf6 POW \cf0 + \cf7 DEX\par \cf5\par \cf0 Female\b0 \b FO\b0 rce\par \cf8\b Skyly\cf0 , \cf9 Pinkal\cf0 , \cf7 Yellowboze\cf0\par \cf4 DEF \cf0 + \cf6 POW \cf0 = \cf7 DEX \cf0 + \cf5 MIND\cf0\lang4105\b0\f1\rtlch\fs17\par }
